data.comment: The match is underway in Saint Etienne.
Saint-Etienne awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 3, Throw-in for Saint-Etienne in their own half.
Throw-in for Nice in the half of Saint-Etienne.
Nice have been awarded a corner by Amaury Delerue.
In the minute 8, Pierre Lees-Melou puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
Amaury Delerue awards the away team a throw-in.
Corner awarded to Saint-Etienne.
In the minute 11, Saint-Etienne drives forward and Zaydou Youssouf gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Nice goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 13, Throw-in high up the field for Nice in Saint Etienne.
Free kick for Saint-Etienne in their own half.
Goal kick for Nice at Stade Geoffroy Guichard.
In the minute 16, Corner awarded to Saint-Etienne.
Ball safe as Nice is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Amaury Delerue signals a free kick to Nice in their own half.
In the minute 17, Throw-in for Saint-Etienne at Stade Geoffroy Guichard.
Can Nice get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Saint-Etienne's half?
Nice to take a throw-in in Saint-Etienne territory.
In the minute 21, Nice's Amine Gouiri goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Pierre Lees-Melou for Nice drives towards goal at Stade Geoffroy Guichard. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Saint-Etienne awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 22, Free kick for Nice in their own half.
Amaury Delerue signals a Nice throw-in in Saint-Etienne's half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 24, Amaury Delerue signals a Saint-Etienne throw-in in Nice's half.
Saint-Etienne have been awarded a corner by Amaury Delerue.
Nice are coming forward and Rony Lopes gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 25, Saint-Etienne have a goal kick.
Can Saint-Etienne get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nice's half?
Throw-in for Nice in the half of Saint-Etienne.
In the minute 29, In Saint Etienne, Nice push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Nice to take a throw-in in Saint-Etienne territory.
Great finish from Amine Gouiri to give Nice a 0-2 lead.
In the minute 33, Nice awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Amaury Delerue signals a free kick to Saint-Etienne in their own half.
In the minute 35, Free kick Saint-Etienne.
Throw-in Nice.
Throw-in for Nice in their own half.
In the minute 36, Can Nice get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Saint-Etienne's half?
Nice to take a throw-in in Saint-Etienne territory.
Corner awarded to Nice.
In the minute 38, Can Nice capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Saint-Etienne's half?
At Stade Geoffroy Guichard, Saint-Etienne are penalized for being offside.
Amaury Delerue signals a free kick to Nice.
In the minute 40, It's a goal kick for the home team in Saint Etienne.
Throw-in for Nice at Stade Geoffroy Guichard.
Amaury Delerue awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 42, Throw-in Nice.
Nice awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Nice in their own half.
In the minute 44, Kevin Monnet-Paquet for Saint-Etienne gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Amaury Delerue awards Nice a goal kick.
Nice needs to be cautious. Saint-Etienne have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 45, Amaury Delerue signals a free kick to Nice in their own half.
Amaury Delerue blows to end the first-half.
The second half has started at Stade Geoffroy Guichard.
Nice awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 46, Claude Puel is making the team's first substitution at Stade Geoffroy Guichard with Miguel Trauco replacing Sadio Sow.
Denis Bouanga is on a sub for Jean-Philippe Krasso for Saint-Etienne.
In the minute 47, Amaury Delerue signals a free kick to Saint-Etienne in their own half.
Amaury Delerue signals a throw-in for Saint-Etienne, close to Nice's area.
Free kick for Saint-Etienne in the half of Nice.
In the minute 49, Hassane Kamara is booked for the away team.
Saint-Etienne have been awarded a corner by Amaury Delerue.
Saint-Etienne's Zaydou Youssouf gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 51, Amaury Delerue awards Nice a goal kick.
Nice awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Saint-Etienne is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 53, Ball goes out of play for a Nice goal kick.
Throw-in for Saint-Etienne in the half of Nice.
In Saint Etienne Nice attack through Pierre Lees-Melou. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 55, It's a goal kick for the home team in Saint Etienne.
Corner awarded to Saint-Etienne.
Goal kick for Nice at Stade Geoffroy Guichard.
In the minute 56, Free kick for Nice in their own half.
Claude Puel (Saint-Etienne) is making a third substitution, with Lucas Gourna Douath replacing Zaydou Youssouf.
Goal! Adil Aouchiche pulls one back for Saint-Etienne to make it 1-2.
In the minute 57, Great play from Romain Hamouma to set up the goal.
In Saint Etienne a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Stanley N`Soki (Nice) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 61, Amaury Delerue signals a Saint-Etienne throw-in in Nice's half.
Ball safe as Saint-Etienne is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Saint-Etienne in their own half.
In the minute 63, Throw-in for Nice at Stade Geoffroy Guichard.
Nice awarded a free kick in their own half.
Saint-Etienne push upfield but Amaury Delerue quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 67, Nice have a goal kick.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Saint-Etienne close to the penalty box.
Walter Benitez for Nice has been booked by Amaury Delerue and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 68, Jordan Lotomba (Nice) has received a yellow card from Amaury Delerue.
Romain Hamouma gets his shot on target but fails to score for Saint-Etienne.
Saint-Etienne have been awarded a corner by Amaury Delerue.
In the minute 70, It's a goal kick for the away team in Saint Etienne.
Amaury Delerue awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick Nice.
In the minute 72, Harold Moukoudi (Saint-Etienne) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Myziane Maolida is replacing Kephren Thuram Ulien for Nice at Stade Geoffroy Guichard.
The home team have replaced Kevin Monnet-Paquet with Maxence Rivera. This is the fourth substitution made today by Claude Puel.
In the minute 73, Nice's Amine Gouiri breaks free at Stade Geoffroy Guichard. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Saint-Etienne at Stade Geoffroy Guichard.
Free kick for Saint-Etienne in the half of Nice.
In the minute 73, At Stade Geoffroy Guichard, Robson Bambu has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Throw-in for Saint-Etienne in the half of Nice.
Lucas Gourna Douath (Saint-Etienne) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in Nice.
In the minute 79, The home team replace Adil Aouchiche with Bilal Benkhedim.
Corner awarded to Nice.
In the minute 82, Nice push forward at Stade Geoffroy Guichard and Stanley N`Soki gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Saint-Etienne defence.
Nice surge into the attack at Stade Geoffroy Guichard but Stanley N`Soki’s header is off-target.
Amaury Delerue awards Saint-Etienne a goal kick.
In the minute 83, Danilo is replacing Rony Lopes for the away team.
Nice make their third substitution with Dan Ndoye replacing Amine Gouiri.
Saint-Etienne have been awarded a corner by Amaury Delerue.
In the minute 84, Nice have a goal kick.
Saint-Etienne's Denis Bouanga is on target but unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Nice close to the penalty box.
In the minute 88, Amaury Delerue signals a free kick to Saint-Etienne.
Amaury Delerue signals a Saint-Etienne throw-in in Nice's half.
Free kick for Nice in their own half.
The fourth official's board shows 4 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Amaury Delerue signals a free kick to Nice in their own half.
Nice awarded a free kick in their own half.
Amaury Delerue signals a free kick to Saint-Etienne in their own half.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-3.
Goal! Nice extend their lead to 1-3 through Myziane Maolida.
That's a fine assist from Dan Ndoye.
Romain Hamouma (Saint-Etienne) has received a first yellow card.
